channel.title: Lug Meeting on Notre Dame Linux Users Group
channel.description: Recent content in Lug Meeting on Notre Dame Linux Users Group

item.title: John Effrey - Language Design
item.description: In our third talk of the semester, resident blogmaster John Effrey discusses his latest adventure in breaking everything he touches - creating the worst programming language ever.

item.title: John Effrey - Intel Management Engine
item.description: In our third talk of the semester, resident blogmaster John Effrey discusses his latest adventure in breaking everything he touches - disabling the intel mangement engine.

item.title: Esoteric Languages
item.description: In the second NDLUG talk in the second half of the fall 2017 semester, Doug and 8bit will talk about esoteric programming languages.

item.title: Will Markley Linux From Scratch
item.description: In the first NDLUG talk in the second half of the fall 2017 semester, Will Markley will talk about his experience with Linux From Scratch.
